name: calligraphy
description:
Karshmeh calligraphy is a new and modern calligraphy that was invented by Ahmad Ariamanesh in 1994 after 500 years and has been very much welcomed by art lovers and I have succeeded in receiving its excellent degree.
The poem of this work is by Hafez Shirazi, the great poet of Iran in the 7th century AH
عشق من با خط مشکین تو امروزی نیست
